author: Anna Staver
title: 28 people want to be Ohio's next chief of public education
Editorial: Why not a state gas tax holiday, Gov. Wolf?

author: Nicole Wells
title: 'I Did That': Stickers at Gas Pumps Point Finger at Biden for Soaring Prices

sentence: With neighboring states, Wolf only beat out Phil Murphy of New Jersey and Andrew Cuomo of New York (45th and 46th, respectively), but placed behind John Carney of Delaware (38th), Larry Hogan of Maryland (35th), Jim Justice of West Virginia (33rd), and Mike DeWine of Ohio (32nd).

title: Pennsylvania Gov. Wolf ranks near bottom on ‘economic freedom’ scorecard; Republicans dominate top of list
